means: （美）雅皮士（属于中上阶层的年轻专业人士）
雅皮士，属于中上阶层的年轻专业人士

sentence.Network_en: The Porsche 911 reminds me of the worst parts of the yuppie era.
sentence.Network_cn: 这辆保时捷911让我想起了雅皮士时代最不堪的那些日子。

sentence.Network_en: This guy is a superficial yuppie with no intellect whatsoever.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个家伙是个肤浅的雅皮士，没有什么头脑。
无论如何, 雅皮愿意去那儿.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅皮士（yuppie）（Yuppies）是young urban professional的缩写，这个词在上个世纪80年代诞生于美国，指的是那些受过高等教育、住在大城 …
几个貌似雅痞（Yuppies）的年轻人在这里猫著，双耳塞著白色的iPod耳机，专注地浏览或翻看著书籍，伴随著书香还有咖啡的香味。 …
对于嬉皮士 (Hippies) 和优皮士 (Yuppies)，你该不会感到陌生。但你有听过绿皮士 (Scuppies) 吗﹖绿皮士一词创自曼克顿的一位企业 …
雅皮/优皮（yuppie）（YUPPIE）是YUP 的昵称，YUP源自YOUNG URBAN PROFESSIONAL首位字母的缩写，即大都市中年轻的专业人才， …

list.abs: you begin to see why people call this the female yuppie heroin .你开始理解为什么人们把这叫做女性雅皮士的海洛因。
disintermediation 取消中间商；直销yuppie puppy 第二代雅皮士DVD (Digital Versatile Disk) 数字化视频光盘.
Qing Wen - Accounting for Taste &middot;... ... 咖啡馆很有情调。 Coffee shops have a nice atmosphere. 很小资。 very yuppy.
My friend is a yuppie . He lives in a huge house in Manhattan ., 我的朋友是城市里一个雅皮士 . 他住在曼哈顿的一所大房子里.

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1980s: elaboration of the acronym from young urban professional

entry.tran: 雅皮士（指收入高、生活奢侈的年轻人）
entry.def: A yuppie is a young person who has a well-paid job and likes to show that they have a lot of money by buying expensive things and living in an expensive way.

example.ex: The Porsche 911 reminds me of the worst parts of the yuppie era.
example.tran: 这辆保时捷911让我想起了雅皮士时代最不堪的那些日子。
雄心勃勃的雅皮士律师

means.word_mean: 1. a young upwardly mobile professional person; someone under 40 who prospered during the 1980s
